name: Reveries
description:
Puzzle RPG game.

Made in under two weeks, yet most of the dialogues were written in the last 2 hours.

Guide the four girls through a monster-filled forest, can you do it?

[Control]

Press [S] on keyboard to switch character (You need to progress to certain part of the game and be in the dungeon to do it.)

Press [A] on your keyboard to execute character's unique ability.

Press [X] on your keyboard to open menu.

Press [Z] on your keyboard to interact with object.

Hint:

-The entire game is beatable even without any power up as long you have high enough HP and shield (purple item on ground), though extra ATK or DEF help a lot when fighting stronger enemy.

-You don't have to open all door and defeat every enemy.

-In case you get stuck and can't progress at all , you can reset your progress with the bonfire.

-It is possible to get all the mushrooms without picking any power up.
